Detailed Description

// See MQTTSession.h for information on various handlers // you can subscribe to. [session setDelegate:self];

[session connectAndWaitToHost:"host" port:1883 usingSSL:NO];

1 Subscribe to a topic:
2 
3 ```objective-c
4 [session subscribeToTopic:topic atLevel:MQTTQosLevelAtLeastOnce];

Add the following to receive messages for the subscribed topics

1  - (void)newMessage:(MQTTSession *)session data:(NSData *)data onTopic:(NSString *)topic qos:(MQTTQosLevel)qos retained:(BOOL)retained mid:(unsigned int)mid
2 {
3 
4 }

Publish a message to a topic:

1 [session publishAndWaitData:data
2  onTopic:@"topic"
3  retain:NO
4  qos:MQTTQosLevelAtLeastOnce]
